info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:24PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harding, northeastern Butte and southwestern Perkins Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 424 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sheep Buttes, or 33 miles southeast of Buffalo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zeona, Sheep Buttes and southeastern Slim Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
